title: Mozzarella chicken with butter bean mash
description: Boneless chicken breasts browned in a pan then covered in a rich tomato sauce with onions and herbs and topped with mozzarella make a delicious supper. Served with butter bean mash and salad, it provides a healthy and satisfying meal. With a GI of 36 this meal is high protein, low GI and provides 472 kcal per portion.
ingredients: 2 x 125g packs reduced fat mozzarella, sliced and drained on kitchen paper
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
